messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Adam. May I know your name, please?
Hi Nicole, how can I assist you today?
I'm really upset right now. I have been using Purina Pro Plan for my dog, and he has been having severe health issues.
I'm sorry to hear that, Nicole. Can you please provide more details about the health issues your dog is experiencing?
He's been vomiting and having diarrhea constantly. It's been a nightmare.
That sounds very concerning. Have you taken your dog to a vet to get a professional opinion?
Yes, the vet said it might be due to the food. That's why I'm calling you.
I understand. We take such matters very seriously. Can you provide me with the batch number of the Purina Pro Plan product you have been using?
I don't have it with me right now, but I can get it later.
That's okay, Nicole. When you have the batch number, please contact us again so we can investigate this issue thoroughly. In the meantime, I recommend discontinuing the use of that product.
I already stopped giving it to him. What are you going to do about this?
We will definitely look into the batch and see if there have been any reported issues. Additionally, we can offer you a refund or a replacement product. What would you prefer?
A refund would be good. I just want to make sure other dogs aren't getting sick from this.
I understand your concern, Nicole. We will initiate the refund process for you. Please keep an eye on your email for further instructions and updates.
Alright, I'll look out for it. Thank you.
You're welcome, Nicole. We're here to help, and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. If you need anything else, please don't hesitate to contact us.
